[
    Expression(
        SemicolonTerminated {
            inner: NullsafePropertyFetch {
                target: Variable(
                    SimpleVariable(
                        SimpleVariable {
                            span: Span(
                                1,
                                7,
                            ),
                            name: "a",
                        },
                    ),
                ),
                span: Span(
                    1,
                    9,
                ),
                property: Identifier(
                    SimpleIdentifier(
                        SimpleIdentifier {
                            span: Span(
                                1,
                                12,
                            ),
                            value: "b",
                        },
                    ),
                ),
            },
            semicolon: Span(
                1,
                13,
            ),
        },
    ),
]
